price: 自分たちが信仰者たちにすること（懲罰）を、見物しつつ。
arabic: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودٞ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wahum ʿalā mā yafʿalūna bil-mu'minīna shuhūdun
